Class.name: Util.Requests.RequestMaker
Class.Description: This class provides ability to form http-requests

Method.name: RequestArrayToQueryString
Method.Description: Builds the query string, of the form "location[?a[=b][&c[=d]...]]", where parameters for query are taken from parameters argument and url-encoded.
Method.Implementation: #dim queryString as %String = "" set queryString = location _ ..ArrayToEncodedParameterString(parameters) quit queryString

Method.name: ArrayToEncodedParameterString
Method.Description: Builds the parameter string, of the form "[?a[=b][&c[=d]...]]", where parameters for query are taken from parameters argument and url-encoded.

Method.name: AppendEncodedParameterToParameterString
Method.Description: Given parameter string (actually arbitrary string) appends parameter specified by key from k and value from v to parameter string.
